SYN_015_0_9:
PREOPERATIVE DIAGNOSIS: Esophageal cancer.
PROCEDURE: Rigid bronchoscopy, sampled lesion, tumor resection, and Silicone Y-stent deployment.
DETAILS: The bronchoscope was navigated to the obstruction. The mass was sampled. APC was utilized to cauterize and resect the tissue. A Y-stent was positioned to bridge the fistula. The airway was stabilized.
